title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a security-conscious user, I want to log in using multiple factors, so that my account remains secure against unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: Must support passwords, OTPs, and biometric verification.
acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to log in using a combination of multiple authentication factors.
test_cases: Given a registered user, When they attempt to log in, Then they must be prompted for multiple authentication factors.

title: Integrate Role-Based Access Controls
description: As an authorized user, I want access control based on my role, so that I can only access features suitable for my authorization level.
attributes_and_rules: Roles must be defined and mapped to specific features and data access levels.
acceptance_criteria: Users must have access to features and data based on their assigned roles.
test_cases: Given a logged-in user, When they try to access restricted features, Then access must be granted or denied based on their role.

title: Implement Secure Session Management
description: As a user, I want secure session management, so that my session remains protected and expires appropriately after inactivity.
attributes_and_rules: Sessions must be secure and timeout after a configurable period of inactivity.
acceptance_criteria: Sessions must time out after a period of inactivity and require re-authentication.
test_cases: Given an inactive user session, When the inactivity period expires, Then the session must be terminated, and re-authentication must be required.

title: Enable Password Reset and Account Recovery
description: As a user, I want to reset my password and recover my account, so that I can regain access if I forget my login details.
attributes_and_rules: Must support secure password reset and account recovery workflows.
acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to reset their password and recover their account securely.
test_cases: Given a user who has forgotten their password, When they initiate a password reset, Then the system must guide them through a secure reset process.

title: Build Personalized User Dashboard
description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see an overview of my account details and tailored service suggestions.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard must be responsive and tailored to the user's profile and eligibility.
acceptance_criteria: Users must see their personalized account details and service suggestions on the dashboard.
test_cases: Given a logged-in user, When they access their dashboard, Then it must display personalized account details and service suggestions.

title: Enable Widget Customization on Dashboard
description: As a user, I want to customize my dashboard widgets, so that I can quickly access my most used features.
attributes_and_rules: Users must be able to add, remove, and organize dashboard widgets.
acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to customize the widgets on their dashboard.
test_cases: Given a logged-in user, When they try to customize their dashboard, Then they must be able to add, remove, and organize widgets.

title: Ensure Responsive Dashboard Design
description: As a user, I want a responsive dashboard design, so that I can have a consistent experience across all my devices.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard must be responsive and function well on all device types.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard must function well and be responsive across all device types.
test_cases: Given a user accessing the dashboard on different devices, When they navigate the dashboard, Then it must be consistently responsive and functional.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Develop Self-Service Account Opening Workflow
description: As a new user, I want to easily apply for a new account, so that I can quickly start using banking services.
attributes_and_rules: Workflow must be streamlined with minimal steps and secure document upload functionality.
acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to apply for new accounts through a guided self-service workflow.
test_cases: Given a new user, When they apply for a new account, Then they must be guided through minimal steps with secure document uploads.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Enable Secure Document Uploads
description: As a user, I want to securely upload required documents, so that my account application process can be completed seamlessly.
attributes_and_rules: Document uploads must be secure and support various document types.
acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to securely upload required documents during account applications.
test_cases: Given a user applying for a new account, When they upload required documents, Then the uploads must be secure and accepted.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Implement Application Saving and Resumption
description: As a user, I want to save my application and resume later, so that I can complete it at my convenience without starting over.
attributes_and_rules: Users must be able to save incomplete applications and resume later.
acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to save incomplete applications and resume them later.
test_cases: Given a user filling an application, When they save it partway, Then they must be able to resume later from where they left off.

title: Implement Real-Time Notifications for User Requests
description: As a user, I want real-time notifications, so that I can stay informed about the status of my requests immediately.
attributes_and_rules: Notifications must cover all key actions including submissions, approvals, and additional information requests.
acceptance_criteria: Users must receive real-time notifications for all key actions regarding their requests.
test_cases: Given a user request, When its status changes, Then the user must receive a real-time notification.

title: Create Status Tracking Section in Portal
description: As a user, I want to track the status of my requests, so that I can view current and past request statuses in one place.
attributes_and_rules: Must have a dedicated section to view all request statuses comprehensively.
acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to view a comprehensive status of their requests in one place.
test_cases: Given a user with multiple requests, When they access the status tracking section, Then they must see current and past statuses of all their requests.

title: Maintain Comprehensive User Interaction History
description: As an admin, I want to view a secure log of all user interactions, so that I can ensure compliance and transparency in user activities.
attributes_and_rules: Must store user interactions in a tamper-proof, secure manner.
acceptance_criteria: Admins must view a secure, tamper-proof log of all user interactions.
test_cases: Given an admin, When they access the user audit logs, Then they must see a comprehensive and secure history of all user interactions.

title: Provide Summarized User Activity History
description: As a user, I want to view a summary of my activity history, so that I can keep track of my interactions with the portal.
attributes_and_rules: Activity summaries must be accessible without exposing sensitive information.
acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to view a summary of their activity history in a protected manner.
test_cases: Given a user, When they access their activity history, Then they must see a summary without exposing sensitive information.

epic_title: Core Banking Integration and Data Architecture
title: Develop Integration Layer for Core Banking System Communication
description: As a developer, I want a robust integration layer, so that our portal can communicate securely and seamlessly with the core banking platform.
attributes_and_rules: Must enable real-time synchronization with core banking plus high performance and scalability.
acceptance_criteria: Integration layer must provide secure, real-time communication with core banking systems.
test_cases: Given the integration layer, When requests are sent to the core banking system, Then they must be securely processed in real time.

epic_title: Core Banking Integration and Data Architecture
title: Implement Optimized Database for Portal Operations
description: As a database architect, I want an optimized database, so that portal operations remain performant and scalable.
attributes_and_rules: Must employ caching, queueing, and transaction monitoring techniques.
acceptance_criteria: The database must be optimized for high performance and scalability in portal operations.
test_cases: Given the portal database, When subjected to high loads, Then it must maintain consistent performance and scalability.

title: Design Fully Responsive UI
description: As a user, I want a fully responsive UI, so that I can have a consistent experience across all my devices.
attributes_and_rules: UI must function consistently on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
acceptance_criteria: The UI must be fully responsive across all device types.
test_cases: Given a user on different devices, When they navigate the UI, Then it must be fully responsive and consistent.

title: Ensure WCAG Accessibility Compliance
description: As an accessibility-focused user, I want the portal to comply with WCAG standards, so that I can use it regardless of my disabilities.
attributes_and_rules: Must comply with WCAG standards to ensure inclusivity.
acceptance_criteria: The portal must meet WCAG accessibility standards.
test_cases: Given a user with disabilities, When they access the portal, Then they must be able to use it in compliance with WCAG standards.
